name: Totem

skills.name: Poisonous Evocation
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 2.5% [Poison] debuff on the target for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Malediction
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if a buff is removed.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Manglestorm
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff on the target for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
